verses.name: Job 24:16
verses.text: In the dark they dig through houses, which they had marked for themselves in the daytime: they know not the light.

verses.name: Job 24:17
verses.text: For the morning is to them even as the shadow of death: if one know them, they are in the terrors of the shadow of death.

verses.name: Job 24:18
verses.text: He is swift as the waters; their portion is cursed in the earth: he beholdeth not the way of the vineyards.

verses.name: Job 24:19
verses.text: Drought and heat consume the snow waters: so doth the grave those which have sinned.
